overview.en: EasyFi (EASY) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. EasyFi has a current supply of 10,000,000 with 1,997,604.13004063 in circulation. The last known price of EasyFi is 18.06804286 USD and is down -5.76 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 17 active market(s) with $6,545,365.43 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://easyfi.network/.
